wikipedia_page.main: The Bennet family is a fictional family created by the English novelist Jane Austen, in her 1813 novel, Pride and Prejudice. Mrs. Bennet's first name is Alice. The family consists of Mr. and Mrs. Bennet, and their five daughters, Jane, the novel's protagonist Elizabeth, Mary, Catherine and Lydia.Set in the Regency era, the family belong to the landed gentry of Hertfordshire. Living in a society where marriage is the only purpose and possible future for a young woman of good family, the complex relationships between the Bennets influence the evolution of the plot.
